name: God's forgiveness Chapter 1 *Updated
description:
Hey everyone, this is my first game I have every made. I have no experience with game development or the engine I will be using(ren'py). Just give me a chance and see if you like it.   I have updated my VN game and it is now at Chapter 1 standing at 1k words and about 10-15 minutes long. I hope you enjoy it as much as I enjoyed making it. 

--Please look at credit for art in game folder to see all the amazing people.
